PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2012-02182012-03-01,  ,  ,  ,  FIN
ActFirst Nations Goods and Services Tax Act
SubjectOrder Amending Schedule 2 to the First Nations Goods and Services Tax Act, No. 2012-1 (Three Manitoba Bands)
PrecisOrder amending schedule 2 to the FIRST NATIONS GOODS AND SERVICES TAX ACT, NO. 2012-1 (THREE MANITOBA BANDS) in order to enable the bands, with the AGREEMENT of the Province of Manitoba, to exercise provincial-type tax powers within their reserves.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2012-0025 Publication Date: 2012-03-14
AttachmentsAttachment
